name: Bolf (itch)
description:
A simple game about getting a golf ball into the hole!

Try to win with a par of 10 on the randomized holes!

Space to stroke.

R to reset position.

Esc to exit game.

Shift to enable colorblind mode.

+ v1.1.1 +

> Updated instructions.

> Changed mouse cursor.

> Stopped the ball from getting off the window.

-- v1.1 --

> Added colorblind mode.

> Fixed r and esc keys now working properly.
